Sentencas: A mathematical model of a solid oxide fuel cell is presented for investigation of the thermodynamic cycles of power plants.
Titulo: Thermodynamic Modeling of Power Plants Based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: The model is one-dimensional in two directions: in the direction of fuel flow in the supply channel and perpendicular to the contact planes of the electrolyte and electrodes.
Titulo: Thermodynamic Modeling of Power Plants Based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Electrochemical reactions are assumed to run in the area of nonzero width adjoining the electrolyte.
Titulo: Thermodynamic Modeling of Power Plants Based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Natural gas is taken as a fuel, and its internal steam conversion in a porous anode is considered.
Titulo: Thermodynamic Modeling of Power Plants Based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: Heat transfers are governed by the model of a generalized heat exchanger, described by accumulation curves of temperature-versus-power for heat sources and sinks.
Titulo: Thermodynamic Modeling of Power Plants Based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells

Sentencas: A binary plant with a fuel cell at atmospheric pressure and a subatmospheric gas-turbine bottoming is considered as an example.
Titulo: Thermodynamic Modeling of Power Plants Based on Solid Oxide Fuel Cells
